name: shag
content:
shag verb [I or T]
(SEX)
UK offensive a rude word meaning to have sex with someone
shag verb [I or T]
(BASEBALL)
US to practise catching a hit baseball, or to pick up balls that have been used in a practice: He was out in left field, shagging fly balls.
